name: BnmrVideoPlayer
description: Class used to setup a new video player component.

name: setup
description: Initializes configuration for video player component.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description:
"autoplay": Boolean of whether the video should start playing upon load. Default: true.

"controls": Boolean of whether the video should have controls visible when the user mouses over the video. Default true.

"file"*: If no playlist is provided, the string value of the path to the video file.

"height": Number value of the number of pixels the video should have in height or the string "auto". Default: "auto".

"location"*: CSS selector for the DOM element to contain the video. Default: "body".

"loop": Boolean of whether the video should restart upon completion. If a playlist, plays through all before replaying. Default: true.

"muted": Boolean of whether the video should start muted. Default: false.

"playlist"*: If no file is provided, an array of string values of the paths to video files.

"poster": String value of the path to a poster image for the video. Default: null.

"width": Number value of the number of pixels the video should have in height or the string "auto". Default: "auto".

example: <div id="video-container"></div><div id="video2"></div><script type="text/javascript">var video = new BnmrVideoPlayer();var video2 = new BnmrVideoPlayer();video.setup({	autoplay : "true",	controls : "true",	height : 180,	location : "#video-container",	loop : "true",	muted : "false",	playlist : [		"videos/video4.mp4",		"videos/video5.mp4",		"videos/video6.mp4",		"videos/video1.mp4",		"videos/video2.mp4",		"videos/video3.mp4"	],	width : 320});video2.setup({	autoplay : "false",	controls : "true",	file : "videos/video.mp4",	height : 450,	location : "#video2",	loop : "false",	muted : "true",	width : 800});</script>

name: play
description: Begins or resumes playback of video.

name: volume
description: Toggles whether the video is muted or unmuted.

name: mute
description: Mutes the playback of the video.

name: unmute
description: Unmutes the playback of the video.

name: replay
description: Restarts video or playlist of videos

name: next
description: If the component has a playlist, skips to the next video. If at the last video, begins playback of the first video and plays through playlist again

name: previous
description: If the component has a playlist, begins playback of previous video. If at first video, begins playback of last video in playlist.
